Wait, but in some of these words, like 'daring', the 'r's are not together. Let me check.

In 'daring', it's da-rr-ing, so yes, there are two r's together.

Similarly, in 'erratic', it's e-rr-atic, so that's fine.

In 'farrier', it's farr-i-er, so again, 'rr' together.

In 'garrulous', it's gar-ru-lous, so 'rr' together.

Okay, so all these words have 'rr' in them.
